== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:  # a leader
    - a
    - b
    - c
  follower1:
    description: a follower
    type: number
    default:
      type: index
----
